cbinstall.name: aMember Connector
cbinstall.author: Alex Scott
cbinstall.description: Version 1.0 -- Plugin that creates a connection between Community Builder and aMember Pro ver. 4 via aMember Remote API.

param.name: amURL
param.label: URL of Amember
param.description: This is the URL that Amember is located in, like http://www.yoursite.com/amember

param.name: amApiKey
param.label: Api Key
param.description: This is the Api Key configured at aMember CP -> Remote API Permissions

param.name: amProductId
param.label: Add a subscription
param.description: When user signs up to Joomla, add a subscription to the following aMember Product

field.title: aMember ID
field.name: cb_amemberid
field.description: This is the users id number in aMember.
